issue.title: Cleanup obsolete rules or dead sites in JapaneseFilter
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

The following domains are inaccessible, sold, return a 403 error, or redirect to other domains. 
I accessed these domains using Chrome version 124.0.6367.91 on Windows 11, 23H2, with the UA left at its default (Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36)

### Proposed solution

For cosmetic rules, it's possible to delete the rule. For basic rules, I am not certain. 


### Additional information

On some websites, there was a notice indicating that they are currently under maintenance. 
However, given that the dates mentioned do not match the present, it's possible these sites have been left in maintenance mode.

comment.body:
> I accessed these domains using Chrome

That is not a very reliable way. For example, `2-d.jp` is living `https://yutorize.2-d.jp/ytsheet/sw2.5/`. You can use https://publicwww.com/ and Google search (check exact search `"2-d.jp"` and `site: 2-d.jp`).
